items.title: What's the difference between Lite and Pro plans?
items.content: The Pro plan offers more advanced features including unlimited product uploads and promotion posts, analytics tools, and bulk messaging capabilities, while charging 12% of monthly income versus 8% for Lite.

items.title: Why is the Pro plan 'Recommended'?
items.content: The Pro plan offers more advanced features including unlimited product uploads and promotion posts, analytics tools, and bulk messaging capabilities, while charging 12% of monthly income versus 8% for Lite.

items.title: How is the monthly income percentage calculated?
